text: On June 1, 2022, 45-year old Michael Louis shot several people at the Natalie Building, part of Saint Francis Hospital, in Tulsa, Oklahoma, United States. He killed four people, three of whom were hospital staff, and injured no more than ten. Louis then committed suicide. Louis had surgery at the hospital a few days before the shooting and targeted his surgeon because of him not helping with Louis's back pain. The shooting happened eight days after the Robb Elementary School shooting in Uvalde, Texas. ==References== Category:2022 mass shootings in the United States Category:2022 murders in the United States Category:2020s in Oklahoma Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in 2022 Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in the United States Category:June 2022 events Category:Mass murder in 2022 Category:Murder- suicides in the United States Category:Murders by firearm in the United States Category:Suicide in 2022 Hospital shooting
